$tic_id..read: root.child('ticGroups/' + root.child('tics/' + $tic_id + '/group').val() + '/public').val() === true || root.child('users/' + auth.uid + '/superuser').val() === true

$user_id..write: root.child('ticGroups/' + root.child('tics/' + $tic_id + '/group').val() + '/write').val() === true && $user_id === auth.uid && (root.child('ticGroups/' + root.child('tics/' + $tic_id + '/group').val() + '/public').val() === true || root.child('users/' + auth.uid + '/superuser').val() === true)
